title: SDE Applied AI
highlights: Built backend and app for OCR + NLP/LLM pipeline; automated 10,000+ appraisal PDFs/year, saving ~300 manual hours/month.
Designed two-layer matching/ETL (Heuristics + LLM) standardizing 50+ tax-roll datasets/year; scalable to 3,000+ counties and cut review time by 85%.

title: Founding Engineer / Consultant

title: B.Tech, Aerospace Engineering
